MCA.label: Merchant Cash Advance
MCA.description: Lump sum cash in exchange for a percentage of future daily sales.

TERM.label: Term Loan
TERM.description: Traditional lump sum loan repaid over a fixed period with interest.

RBF.label: Revenue Based Financing
RBF.description: Capital in exchange for a percentage of monthly revenue until a cap is reached.

LOC.label: Line of Credit
LOC.description: Revolving credit limit you can draw from as needed.

EQUIP.label: Equipment Financing
EQUIP.description: Loans specifically for purchasing business machinery or vehicles.

INV.label: Invoice Factoring
INV.description: Selling unpaid invoices to a third party at a discount for immediate cash.
